summary: A private list of standalones and compatibility patches to use with T3nd0s Skyrim Redone. Created to resolve conflicts between mods.
descriptionHtml:
Introduction

Until further notice this mod/list should be private.
This is a list of standalones and compatibility patches to use with T3nd0s Skyrim Redone. 
Created to resolve conflicts between mods.

Installation

- Nexus Mod Manager (NMM): If you use NMM, go to the file section and click \"Download with Manager\" button. Activate the mod when inside NMM. 
Go back in the plugin section, de-select any esp\'s you do not have the masters for and sort the Load Order.

- Manual Installation: Go to the file section and click \"Download manually\". Once the archive has been downloaded, extract the contents in the Skyrim/Data folder and activate the esp\'s. Once again, make sure the Load Order is correct.

SkyRe Master file location
T3nd0s Skyrim Redone v. 0.99.23.2 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286)

Compatibility Patches - Masters
AZ Argonian Pride v. unknown (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30385)
EzE\'s -Artifact Disenchanting v4.7 (http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7793)
EzE\'s -Artifact Disenchanting - Dawnguard v1.5 (http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=92858703)
Radiant and Unique Potions and Poisons v2 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18799)
Unlimited Amulets and Rings for the Modern Era by Winterlove

Original Mods, cit. only. The ones provided in this patch are Standalone.
Enchantments Upgraded v1.5 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29316)
Higher Bounties Hold Specific v1.1 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11862)
Improved Skill Books v1.1 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9960)
Lightweight Scrolls v1 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2227)


Load Order

...
hothtrooper44_ArmorCompilation.esp (only for AZ Argonian Pride)
...
Radiant and Unique Potions and Poisons v2.0.esp
...
STPUnlimitedAmulets.esp
STPUnlimitedAmuletsDawnguard.esp
STPUnlimitedAmuletsDragonborn.esp
STPUnlimitedRings.esp
STPUnlimitedRingsDawnguard.esp
STPUnlimitedRingsDragonborn.esp
...
SkyRe_Main.esp (and any optional SkyRe modules)
SkyRe_Races.esp (only for AZ Argonian Pride)
...
Radiant and Unique Potions and Poisons - SkyRe patch.esp
STPUnlimited Amulets & Rings - SkyRe patch.esp
...
AZ Argonian Pride.esp
AZAP- SkyRe patch.esp
AZAP- Immersive Armors patch.esp (if using Immersive Armors)
...
artifact disenchanting.esp
artifact disenchanting - dawnguard.esp
Artifact Disenchanting - SkyRe patch
...
Enchantments Upgraded for SkyRe.esp
Higher Bounties Hold Specific for SkyRe.esp
Improved Skill Books for SkyRe.esp
Lightweight Scrolls for SkyRe.esp
...
author: Maeried

files.name: SkyRe - Compatibility Patches collection
files.changelogHtml: Added SPT Unlimited Amulets & Rings for the Modern Era patch.
